author: Mallika Goyal, MD
photographer: Mallika Goyal, MD, Apollo Health City, Hyderabad, India
description: Bilateral extensive retinal vascular occlusion in a 25-year-old lady with antiphospholipid antibody syndrome following resolution of hypertensive retinopathy grade 4 . She had recurrent abortions and recently resolved papilledema from idiopathic raised intracranial pressure.
